title: Riot should make a League of Legends movie.
body: ...and have Xerath mains write the script.

replies.body:
Write a LoL movie, why? So they can retcon the lore 6 months later because they didn't like it.
Good joke OP.
Hi. I am 712 game Shyvana one trick. Nice to meet you.

New lore like bull sht

It's stifling creativity!

It irks me a little as a Xerath main tbh, but I'll just take it as a compliment that I succeed as him without scripts I guess...

Good joke btw, if I wasn't a Xerath main I'd probably be laughing a ton xD
I'll still give the upvote because it is a good joke :)
Alright, I'll give you that one :D
I want something original though.  Hollywood already has movies about cancer.
